Node.definition: = a type of song (שִׁיר) probably to be accompanied by musical instruments
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ◄ son of Izhar (יִצְהָר) descendant of Kohath (קֳהָת) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► opponent of Moses (מֹשֶׁה) and Aaron (אַהֲרֹן) ancestor of Korahite (קָרְחִי) clan
= state in which a human being or deity has an elevated status, as a result of their authority, rank, wealth, or wisdom
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= state in which humans or deities are considered worthy of praise

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a hill (גִּבְעָה)
= state in which by which humans or objects have become part of the realm of God and his service ► and therefore no longer accessible to humans unless they have gone through special rituals
= state in which the outward appearance of humans, animals, or objects is pleasing to the eye
= state in which an object is relatively high in elevation; ≈ associated with status

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a hill (גִּבְעָה)
= mountain; ► that part of Jerusalem (יְרוּשָׁלַ͏ִם) on which the temple was built, also known as a fortress and stronghold, city of David (דָּוִד) YHWH's dwelling place
= the part of an object or area that is the furthest away from the perspective of the speaker or narrator

= a mountain, identified with Jebel ʾel Aqraʿ ◄ in northern Syria, ► known by the Canaanites as the mountain of the gods|= a cardinal direction indicating the direction to the left of a person when facing the direction of the rising sun‎, ◄ named after Mount Zaphon which is located in northern Syria

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= state in which deities, humans, or towns have a high status or authority
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= building or part of a building that has been fortified to provide additional security; often connected to the palace
= action by which humans or deities reveal information about themselves to (other) humans

Node.gloss: (God as a) stronghold|(God as a) refuge
Node.definition: = a reference to God characterizing him as someone who provides security
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= action by which two or more parties come together in a certain place for a particular purpose
= state in which humans or objects are jointly involved in an event

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something

Node.gloss: to be in anguish|to be dismayed
Node.definition: = state in which humans experience a great fear combined with severe distress, often accompanied by physical symptoms, such trembling and pain
= action by which humans react to a sudden uncontrollable fear or anxiety and hurry to run away
= process by which the human body shakes, ◄ as a result of fear

Node.gloss: to grasp|to take hold of (something)|to seize|to catch|to hold on (to something)
Node.definition: = to take hold of someone or something; humans typically do this with their hands and animals use their mouths; however, it is often extended to include inanimate objects (traps), personalized qualities (wisdom), emotions (anger, fear), or processes (time)
= state of strong fear and distress, compared to the state of mind of a woman in labor; ► often accompanied by physical side effects, like writhing and trembling
= process by which females among humans or animals give birth to offspring through the process of conception, pregnancy, and labor; ≈ sometimes associated with painful toil and anxiety

= a natural movement of air, blowing in a particular direction, ranging in intensity from a light breeze to a heavy blast ; ≈ often regarded as the breath of God, but also associated with things that are without substance and cannot be grasped
= boat ◄ of a relatively large size ► that is able to sail the sea or ocean
= town or region; ◄ probably located at the Iberian peninsula; described as inhabited by descendants of Javan (יָוָן) son of Japheth (יֶפֶת) ► famous for its commerce
= a linker introducing a propostion that contains the content of what precedes

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

literally: YHWH (or one of the other names of God of a combination thereof) of Hosts; hence: = epithet of God with focus on his being in charge of the host of heavenly beings surrounding his throne, praising him, and carrying out his will in earth; ≈ as an epithet it relates to God's power and control of the cosmos as the divine king and warrior

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
literally: to be established; hence: = causative process by which deities help humans to find security and stability
particle linking an event to a point in time; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in time Y
= a long duration of time that is or may seem unending, whether in the past or in the future
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= action by which humans or deities exercise their minds in order to determine a course of action that will achieve a certain purpose

= state in which humans or deities are committed towards fulfilling their obligations and show that by their actions; these obligations include responsibilities towards kinspeople, spouses, friends, covenant partners, and people to whom one is indebted as a result of favors received
= a building or set of buildings, distinguished from other constructions or houses by its magnificence ► and function, which is either religious or political
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
literally: name; hence: = the information that is generally known about a person or deity, which may either be good or bad and has a direct impact on the way this person or deity is regarded
= action by which humans express their appreciation, admiration, respect, and/or gratitude to deities about who they are and what they do

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

= pattern of behavior of humans or deities that is in accordance to the requirements of the divine law and generally aimed at establishing or restoring this pattern as a standard, which in certain cases requires a victory over evil and results in prosperity and happiness

Node.gloss: to be filled > to be engaged
Node.definition: literally: to be filled (with an activity); hence: = state in which humans are fully engaged in a certain activity, either as victim or as active participant
= the side of the human body which is to the south when facing the direction of the rising sun
= state in which humans and deities feel and show great joy
= a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a hill (גִּבְעָה)
= mountain; ► that part of Jerusalem (יְרוּשָׁלַ͏ִם) on which the temple was built, also known as a fortress and stronghold, city of David (דָּוִד) YHWH's dwelling place
mainly in poetical texts: = state in which humans feel and show great joy

literally: daughters of a town, region, nation; hence: = women that are inhabitants of a place, town, region, or nation, ◄ as if they were the female offspring of that place|plural only: = villages or small towns that are considered part of the territory of a larger town or nation, referred to as the daughters of that larger town or nation

= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה) and, after the exile, a separate administrative district
= the outcome of a dispute between two or more parties, decided by a judge or a deity
= action by which humans move in a full or partial circle
= mountain; ► that part of Jerusalem (יְרוּשָׁלַ͏ִם) on which the temple was built, also known as a fortress and stronghold, city of David (דָּוִד) YHWH's dwelling place
= action with which one determines or estimates the number of a collection of persons or objects
= relatively high structure made of stone; ► used for guarding the surrounding area and/or for providing protection against hostile forces from outside; ≈ associated with security and protection

Node.gloss: to take to heart|to be concerned about
Node.definition: literally: to put (one's) heart on (something); hence: = to process information in one's mind, often with the intention to act upon it later
literally: heart; hence: = the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief

meaning unsure; probably: = a structure surrounding a town, outside the main wall; ◄ made out of of stones or bricks; ► provides strength and security to the town; ≈ sometimes used metaphorically to denote someone who offers protection
exact meaning unsure: = action by which humans carefully study and examine a construction, possibly by walking around or through it
= building or part of a building that has been fortified to provide additional security; often connected to the palace

Node.gloss: to tell|to recount|to proclaim: to declare
Node.definition: = action by which humans communicate verbally to others about an event or situation, with focus on the contents rather than on the speech act
= all of the people born and living at about the same time
= pertaining to being the latest in a chronological range of events, which may be situated in either past, present, or future
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= a long duration of time that is or may seem unending, whether in the past or in the future
= an adverb that specifies unending time
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= process by which humans or animals stop living, either spontaneously or as a result of an act of aggression
